channel.title: Research on Zen LM
channel.description: Recent content in Research on Zen LM

item.title: GT-QLoRA: Uncensoring Trillion-Parameter MoE Models
item.description: Why standard abliteration techniques fail on Mixture-of-Experts models, and how Gate-Targeted QLoRA solves the expert routing problem at 1 trillion parameters.

item.title: Drop-Upcycling and the Birth of Zen MoDE Architecture
item.description: How Drop-Upcycling (arXiv:2502.19261) transforms dense checkpoints into MoE models at 1/4 training cost, and how it shapes Zen MoDE — our Mixture of Distilled Experts architecture.

item.title: BitDelta: 1-Bit Behavioral Compression Across the Zen Model Family
item.description: How BitDelta (arXiv:2402.10193) compresses fine-tuned behavioral deltas to 1-bit precision, enabling the full Zen model family — nano through ultra — to share a single GPU cluster.

item.title: SuRe + OPCM: Production-Grade Continual Learning for Open Models
item.description: Deep dive on Surprise-Driven Prioritized Replay (SuRe) and Orthogonal Projection Continual Merging (OPCM) — the two SOTA techniques we use for catastrophic-forgetting-free LLM adaptation in the Zen model family.

item.title: Zen MoDE: Mixture of Distilled Experts
item.description: A technical deep dive into Zen MoDE — Mixture of Distilled Experts — the architecture underlying all Zen models.

item.title: Proof of AI: Verifiable Machine Learning on Chain
item.description: How we're bringing cryptographic verification to AI inference, enabling trustless machine learning.

item.title: Zen Reranker: Two-Stage Retrieval Done Right
item.description: Introducing the Zen Reranker, a cross-encoder model that dramatically improves retrieval quality in two-stage pipelines.

item.title: 7680-Dimensional Embeddings: More Dimensions, Better Retrieval
item.description: Why we trained embedding models with 7680 dimensions and what we learned about the relationship between dimensionality and retrieval quality.

item.title: Embedding Spaces at 7680 Dimensions
item.description: Exploring high-dimensional embedding spaces for semantic search and retrieval.

item.title: GRPO: Group Relative Policy Optimization
item.description: Introducing GRPO, a new approach to reinforcement learning from human feedback that improves sample efficiency and alignment stability.

item.title: GRPO: Group Relative Policy Optimization
item.description: A companion post to our GRPO paper, explaining group relative policy optimization for language model alignment.

item.title: Federated Learning Without Compromise
item.description: Privacy-preserving machine learning that maintains model quality through novel aggregation protocols.

item.title: Federated Learning for Open AI
item.description: How federated learning enables collaborative model training while preserving data privacy.

item.title: Experience Ledgers: Persistent Memory for AI Agents
item.description: Introducing experience ledgers, a framework for giving AI agents persistent, verifiable memory.

item.title: Training LLMs on Collective Intelligence
item.description: How we're approaching training data curation to capture humanity's collective intelligence.
